title: Is there any option to look at your ward skins?
body:
Is there an option or tab where i can look at the ward skins i own?
outside of game and queue

replies.body:
We don't have a way for you to just look at a list of your ward skins, but I did think of a way you can still check out which skins you have.

If you go into a custom or practice game, you should be able to click on your ward and see all the skins you have there. You should also be able to go into the store, to find a list of what skins you've already bought.

- Click on Store then Accessories
- Select Ward Skins
- Below the search bar click "Show Owned"

They're not the best methods, but that way you'll be able to figure out what all ward skins you have!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q5saYHGQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-16T01:37:00.210+0000)
>
> We don't have a way for you to just look at a list of your ward skins, but I did think of a way you can still check out which skins you have.
> 
> If you go into a custom or practice game, you should be able to click on your ward and see all the skins you have there. You should also be able to go into the store, to find a list of what skins you've already bought.
> 
> - Click on Store then Accessories
> - Select Ward Skins
> - Below the search bar click "Show Owned"
> 
> They're not the best methods, but that way you'll be able to figure out what all ward skins you have!

Okay cool. Thank you very much! :D
A Ward skin tab should be added, next to the skin tab that is about to be added ;)
Then I guess my question is, since you know it's not the best methods, why not put in in the profile or collection page so we could see them, aka a better method?

Y'know, I really wish I could make those changes xD! This is actually a little bothersome for myself as well.


I can't do much myself other than suggest you post this over in Client Discussion where it'll have a better chance for the Devs to see it!
It's just an extra filter under the skins tab Riot, you can do it. {{champion:26}}
